mdRecord.dcterms:description: This typed letter is from Pamela Simpson to Mrs. C. M. Wood and accompanied a copy of a paper written by a student about the Little Octagon building at Blandome. The paper was written for an architecture course taught by Prof. Simpson. The letter dated January 31, 1975 and is on letterhead stationery for the Department of Art at Washington and Lee University.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: From Simpson to Wood, January 31, 1975 (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: College students -- Research
